nodes.text: An individual was a male Jawa who lived on the desert planet Tatooine. He was the brother of the Jawa Tiatha, who was known as a legendary scavenger during the Galactic Civil War. Tiatha stole his brother's ion blaster, a family heirloom, to use as a personal weapon. After four seasons, the blaster earned Tiatha enough wealth to retire.
Tiatha's brother was first mentioned by a card from the Premiere set of Decipher's 2001 Jedi Knights Trading Card Game.
